notes.text:
First KoG without Ca, though I played CAffira from plat 4 to leg 1, but after struggling and losing like 7 in a row i switched to this deck. I was worried that it would be less effective without the PRs but it worked beautifully, oyster with the flying boi is just so damn strong
Didn't face many aliens but every other match-up was easy af, only lost like 4 games throughout all of legend
Kog within 36 wins total
